```{r}
emissions_split = initial_split(df_all_only_total, prop = 0.8)

emissions_train
emissions_test
```

```{r}
emissions_rec <-
  # recipe(`Enteric Fermentation|CO2` ~ ., data = emissions_train) %>%
  recipe(`CO2` ~ ., data = emissions_train) %>%
  step_rm(Year, Area, Item) %>%
  step_zv(all_numeric(), -all_outcomes()) %>%
  step_normalize(all_numeric(), -all_outcomes())

emissions_prep <-
  emissions_rec %>%
  prep()
```

```{r}
lasso_spec <-
  linear_reg(penalty = 0.1, mixture=1) %>%
  set_engine("glmnet")

wf <-
  workflow() %>%
  add_recipe(emissions_rec)

lasso_fit <-
  wf %>%
  add_model(lasso_spec) %>%
  fit(data = emissions_train)

df_coeff <-
  lasso_fit %>%
  pull_workflow_fit() %>%
  tidy()
df_coeff
```

```{r}
df_coeff %>%
  arrange(desc(estimate)) %>%
  filter(term != "(Intercept)")
```

```{r}
df_coeff %>% 
  mutate(
    term = fct_reorder(term, estimate)
  ) %>% 
  arrange(desc(abs(estimate))) %>% 
  filter(term != "(Intercept)") %>%
  # head(30) %>%
  # filter(estimate > 0) %>%
  ggplot(aes(
      x = estimate,
      y = term
    )) +
  geom_col() +
  labs(
    x = "Correlation",
    y = "Animal",
    title = ""
  )
```

```{r}
emissions_boot <- bootstraps(emissions_train, 100)

tune_spec <-
  linear_reg(penalty = tune(), mixture = 1) %>%
  set_engine("glmnet")

lambda_grid <- grid_regular(penalty(), levels = 50)
```

```{r}
lasso_grid <-
  tune_grid(
    wf %>% add_model(tune_spec),
    resamples = emissions_boot,
    grid = lambda_grid
  )
```

```{r}
lasso_grid %>%
  collect_metrics() %>%
  ggplot(aes(penalty, mean, color = .metric)) +
  geom_errorbar(aes(
    ymin = mean - std_err,
    ymax = mean + std_err
  ),
  alpha = 0.5
  ) +
  geom_line(size = 1.5) +
  facet_wrap(~.metric, scales = "free", nrow = 2) +
  scale_x_log10() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```

```{r}
lowest_rmse <- lasso_grid %>%
  select_best("rmse", maximize = FALSE)

final_lasso <- finalize_workflow(
  wf %>% add_model(tune_spec),
  lowest_rmse
)
```

```{r}
last_fit(
  final_lasso,
  emissions_split
) %>%
  collect_metrics()
```

```{r}
folds <- vfold_cv(emissions_train, v = 10)

results <-
  fit_resamples(
    final_lasso,
    folds
  ) %>%
  collect_metrics()
results
```

```{r}
r2 <- results %>% filter(.metric == "rsq")
confidence_level = 0.95
lo <- pull(r2, "mean") - qnorm( 1 - (1 - confidence_level) / 2 ) * pull(r2, "std_err")
hi <- pull(r2, "mean") + qnorm( 1 - (1 - confidence_level) / 2 ) * pull(r2, "std_err")
lo
hi
```
